Text:
hope you find something for the PC [IBM compatible] /Microsoft users too.

Think I'll d/l (and seed till 200%/210MB) it for a friend (who has a Mac).. till I scout for something that might work both with XP_x86 and Win7_64bit (or the Win8 under development.. I have the edition they showed at CES)

I had this free from my company, but I couldn't find a way to get it to stop "auto deletion" of "infected" files. Quarantine them and let me delete was not an option I could find. Hope you have better luck!
